title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - July 27th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - July 27th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Josh Green details Elizabeth Warren’s radical plan to beat Trump at his own game

-Liz McCormick on how a decade of low rates and bond yields is changing everything

-Rebecca Greenfield explains why it’s getting harder to fire people for using marijuana

-John Hechinger describes how shark fever is sweeping Cape Cod

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
